title: chrisism
author: chrisism
content: For Sale: Full FutureBit Apollo BTC Package - Desktop Class Controller with 1TB NVMe Drive with 200W PSU plus a Standard USB Controlled Hashboard with 200W PSU.$1200 + shippingDM or email to contact

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: as this is currently 899.99 brand new direct from Futurebit - what would be the buyers incentive to pay you $300 more for a used miner/psu?no real issue with your price - charge what you want, I just am curious what would be the incentive.
